HomePage.title: Hi, I'm
HomePage.name: Dina.
HomePage.about: A passionate about developing applications that connect people and ideas.

AboutPage.title: About me
AboutPage.about: I am a software developer with experience in React, React Native, and Kotlin, specializing in creating cross-platform applications for Android and iOS. I am passionate about designing efficient solutions tailored to the needs of each project. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge in Next.js to continue innovating in web and mobile development.
AboutPage.date1: Completed a Higher Technical Certificate in Cross-platform application development.
AboutPage.date2: Internship in Amsterdam developing with React and React Native.

project1.title: App of healthy recipes
project1.description: An app dedicated to healthy recipes from around the world, designed to enjoy delicious, nutritious, and easy-to-prepare meals.

project2.title: Portfolio website
project2.description: A website designed to showcase my skills as a programmer, including my projects, experience, and achievements. I implemented a responsive design and added multilingual support (i18n) in Spanish and English.
